nodes.text: The Scabbard Monument of Krownest was located on the Mandalorian world of Krownest. A munit'kad halberd, an ancient Mandalorian weapon, was kept at the monument; however, it was stolen in 7966 C.R.C.. The Archaic Arsenal on the Mandalorian world of Ordo had an ancient rally master lance stolen within weeks of the theft of Krownest's halberd, prompting each world to suspect the other. Both weapons were later displayed aboard crime lord Dryden Vos's yacht, the First Light, by the year 10 BBY.

During the New Republic Era, a file on stolen artifacts thought to have possibly been in Vos's possession was included in Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, a collection of case files compiled by Commissioner Exantor Divo, head of the planet Hosnian Prime's law enforcement. The munit'kad halberd's theft from the Scabbard Monument of Krownest was documented in the file.
The Scabbard Monument of Krownest was mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
